properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS TITLEIMG FROM BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 3 AND B.REF_CNO=? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, REF_UNO, REF_CNO ) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? ,? ,?,?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?,?,?,?)
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT JOIN BOARD B ON (BOARD_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE B.REF_CNO = ? ORDER BY UPLOAD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 4

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_ID, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (REF_UNO = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 4 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_CNO = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, REF_UNO, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_ID, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS' ) AS CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = REPLY_WRITER) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, REPLY_NO DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, REF_UNO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, REF_CNO) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? ,? ,?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_ANO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ? , ?, ?, ?)
